scripts.docker:start: node oracle_local_init/replace.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d
scripts.docker:kill: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down --remove-orphans --volumes --rmi local && echo 'Removing oracles data persist' && sudo rm -r data/oracle/*
scripts.docker:oracle:up: npm run docker:oracle:env && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node oracle_local_init/migrate.js up
scripts.docker:oracle:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node oracle_local_init/migrate.js down
scripts.docker:oracle:seeds: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node oracle_local_init/seed.js
scripts.docker:jobs:buildAffaires: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node src/jobs/buildAffaires.js
scripts.docker:jobs:import: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node src/jobs/import.js
scripts.docker:jobs:reinject: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml exec openjustice-sder node src/jobs/reinject.js
